titleInfo.title: Dissertation on Competitive and Directed Search

mods.abstract: This thesis has been written within the European Doctorate in Economics - Erasmus Mundus (EDEEM), with the purpose to obtain a joint doctorate degree in economics at the Department of Economics of Université Paris 1-Panthéon Sorbonne and at the Department of Business Administration and Economics at Universität Bielefeld
